Text: Coolt som fan! Hur är kvalitén? Det cirkulerar ju en och annan taskig VHS-kopia.

Thank you for this fantastic piece of metal history. As a graduate of '83 this music reminds me of a time before pits or "BP". Punk rock sucks and is now DEAD. DEATH BY METAL. We will always remember where we came from. UP THE IRONS

Hi Piratsaft, great Upload, thanks a lot for sharing!!! Do you have the full set of Iron Maiden live at Bremen in 1981 and would you upload this? This would be really really great! Many thanks in advance!

Ok, guys
You've really build up my expectations!!

For all the Metal fans I know from the 80's this concert is the incarnation of Heavy Metal.

There has been a lot of talk about why it was not has not been officially released in digitally remastered version.

I had a full betamax copy and a partial MC tape from the coherent transmission in the radio in stereo.

When I obtained a HIFI stereo video later on I managed to syncronize the betamax and MC tape with moderate success, but it was partial.

Since I can still hear the roar of the introduction of Judas Priest's "Riding on the wind" ringing in my ear all the way back from 1983, I am sorry to say it, but the sound sucks!! The images is great, but audio leaves something to be desired :-(

I am glad to have it, but it has not stopped me from planning going on a rampage to get ZDF to do what it takes bring that moment back to life again.

I cannot be the only one having a decent stereo recording even though it is 25 years old this month.
